subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nykesha Sales scored 25 points to lead the Connecticut Sun to a 93-88 victory in triple overtime against the visiting Indiana Fever in the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference semifinals. It was the first overtime playoff game in league history. Connecticut (19-16) took a 1-0 lead in the best-of-three series. Anna DeForge had a season-high 31 points for the Fever (21-14).In Western Conference semifinals opener last night, Nicole Powell scored 22 points and the Sacramento Monarchs played sterling defense in an 86-65 victory over the visiting San Antonio Silver Stars.
